ar: إِنَّ أَصْحَبَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَكِهُونَ
en: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation -

ar: هُمْ وَأَزْوَجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَلٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكُِٔونَ
en: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches.

ar: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
en: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]
[And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord.
[Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals.

ar: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَبَنِى ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَنَ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
en: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy -
And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path.

ar: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
en: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
This is the Hellfire which you were promised.
[Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
That Day, We will seal over their mouths,
and their hands will
and their hands will speak to Us,

That Day, We will seal over their mouths,
and their hands will speak to Us,
and their feet will testify about what they used to earn.

ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَى أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَطَ فَأَنَّى يُبْصِرُونَ
en: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?

ar: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَهُمْ عَلَى مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
en: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return.
